enhanced_by.reason: ParameterChecker.checkParameter is used to validate mandatory parameters before placing the TWAP order.
ParameterChecker.checkRequiredParameter is used to ensure that required parameters are present before placing the TWAP order.

enhanced_by.method_name: requestHandler.sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The response from requestHandler.sendSignedRequest can be used to verify the successful placement of the TWAP order.
The getOpenOrders method can be used to verify that the TWAP order is listed among the open orders after placement.
